themes: insufficient and poorly structured funding disbursement
key_phrases: not been timely in notifying applicants
impacted their ability to even execute the projects
offers only $4,500 upfront and then gives $500 after the project is done
requires the artist to fundraise even more
providing virtual sessions immediately vs. requiring people to attend in person
barriers_identified: requirement to attend in-person sessions to receive funds
artists must front costs and fundraise additional amounts
solutions_proposed: provide virtual sessions immediately instead of requiring in-person attendance
give the full funding amount upfront to alleviate stress
